 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package cellularAutomata.analysis

Class Summary
AllPopulationAnalysis Finds the percentage of each state at each generation.
Analysis Analyzes cellular automaton data.
AverageValueAnalysis Finds the average value of all sites.
BoxCountingDimensionAnalysis Estimates the fractal dimension of a CA using the box-counting dimension.
CellTrackerAnalysis Keeps track of the value at a particular site.
ClusterAnalysis Finds the size and distributions of clusters of states.
CorrelationDimensionAnalysis Estimates the fractal dimension of a CA using the correlation dimension.
GeneticAlgorithmAnalysis Finds the fitness of cells that hold chromosomes representing pi.
HammingDistanceAnalysis Finds the Hamming distance between the initial and current state.
LargestNeighborhoodAnalysis Finds the largest neighborhoods on the lattice for any particular state.
MemoryUsageAnalysis Tracks the amount of memory being used, and plots.
MusicAnalysis Takes a slice of cells, treats occupied cells as notes on a musical staff, and then plays that music.
NeighborhoodSizeAnalysis Finds the distribution of connectivity of sites with any given state.
PercentOccupiedAnalysis Finds the percentage of sites that are occupied (full) at each generation.
PinCellValueAnalysis Pins selected cells to a particular state.
PlotSliceValuesAnalysis Plots the values of a slice through a one- or two-dimensional analysis.
RandomAnalysis Tests for randomness in the bits of a CA.
ShowNeighborhoodAnalysis Shows the neighborhood of any given cell.
SliceAnalysis Shows a slice through a two-dimensional analysis.
SpeedOfSimulationAnalysis Tracks the speed of the simulation, and plots.
TargetValueAnalysis Compares the cell's current value to a target state.
